profile_summary:
As a Core Engine/C++ Optimization Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess extensive expertise in **C++** programming and advanced optimization techniques, specializing in multithreading and performance profiling using **VTune** and console profiling tools. My background includes in-depth analysis of CPU/GPU crash dumps, ensuring system stability and performance enhancements. I am adept at developing high-performance solutions and optimizing existing codebases to meet stringent standards.

My original strengths lie in utilizing modern software development practices and frameworks. I have led projects leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Python** to create scalable applications across sectors. Furthermore, I bring experience in cloud services, primarily with **Azure** and **AWS**, focusing on CI/CD automation and compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, my hands-on work in machine learning workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** adds value to my profile by integrating advanced technological capabilities.
